trans-unit.source: A specialty class that allows applications to call the <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker.SendAsync*> method on an Http handler chain.
trans-unit.target: 可讓呼叫的應用程式的特殊類別<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker.SendAsync*>Http 處理常式鏈結上的方法。</xref:System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker.SendAsync*>

trans-unit.source: This class is the base type for <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient> and other message originators.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是基底型別<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient>和其他訊息發送者。</xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient>

trans-unit.source: Most applications that are connecting to a web site will use one of the <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient.SendAsync%2A> methods on the <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 要連接到網站的大部分應用程式會使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient.SendAsync%2A>方法的<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient>類別。</xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient> </xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker"></xref> class with a specific <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker"></xref>類別具有特定<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler"></xref> responsible for processing the HTTP response messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler"> </xref>負責處理 HTTP 回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker"></xref> class with a specific <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker"></xref>類別具有特定<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler"></xref> responsible for processing the HTTP response messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler"> </xref>負責處理 HTTP 回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the inner handler should be disposed of by Dispose(),<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if you intend to reuse the inner handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果內部處理常式應由 dispose （） 處置<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果您想要重複使用內部處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and disposes of the managed resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 版本所使用的 unmanaged 的資源並處置 managed 資源<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker"></xref> and optionally disposes of the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker"></xref>並選擇性處置 managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to releases only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Send an HTTP request as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步作業傳送 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete once the entire response including content is read.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件會在讀取包括內容的整個回應之後完成。</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>

trans-unit.source: Most applications that are connecting to a web site will use one of the <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient.SendAsync%2A> methods on the <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 要連接到網站的大部分應用程式會使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient.SendAsync%2A>方法的<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient>類別。</xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient> </xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request message to send.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送的 HTTP 要求訊息。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token to cancel operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消語彙基元來取消作業。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。
